title: Grilled Polenta Bites with Black Bean Salsa

Ingredients.1: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained

Ingredients.8: 1 (16 ounce) tube polenta, cut into 1/2-inch rounds

Ingredients.10: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Combine black beans, tomato, onion, jalapeno, cilantro, lime juice, and 1 teaspoon salt in a bowl. Stir to combine. Set aside.

Directions.2: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate.

Directions.3: Lay polenta rounds on a clean work surface and brush the tops with olive oil. Flip the rounds over and brush the other side with olive oil. Lightly season one side.

Directions.4: Grill polenta rounds for 5 minutes. Using a spatula, flip them over and grill for 5 minutes longer. Top with black bean salsa just before serving.
